Gerry Ryan sheds light on decision to call off Manuela Fundación deal

Mitchelton-Scott team owner Gerry Ryan has shed more light on his decision to pull out of an arrangement that would have seen the squad becoming Team Manuela Fundación, telling the Sydney Morning Herald and The Age that “it wasn’t the deal that I thought it was.” On June 18, Ryan pulled the plug on a …
